csheets.ext.style
Class StylableCell

java.lang.Object
  csheets.ext.CellExtension
      csheets.ext.style.StylableCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cell, CellListener, Extensible<Cell>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Cell>, java.util.EventListener
public class StylableCell
extends CellExtension

An extension of a cell in a spreadsheet, with support for style, i.e. font, format, alignment, color and border.

Author:
Einar Pehrson
See Also:
Serialized Form
